author: Ryan Daws
description:
A dedicated crew, the Swift on Android Working Group, has assembled with the mission to make the language a first-class citizen in the Android world. The working group signals a shift away from Apple’s usual approach towards a future where building for Android with Swift is as streamlined and reliable as it is for the... Read more »

The post Official group aims for Swift language support on Android appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Official group aims for Swift language support on Android
